about_the_game:
"Noble Clothing Men's and Children" is a character generator asset package that includes clothing for aristocratic men and children’s characters. It specifically caters to game themes centered around the royal family and aristocracy, providing creators with a valuable resource to enhance the game's story and background setting.

■ Various Styles of Aristocratic Attire:
From magnificent royal regalia to refined men's suits, enrich your characters with a noble ambiance.

■ Aristocratic Wardrobe Assets Tailored for Male Characters:
Every element in this asset pack is meticulously crafted for adult males and boy characters, ensuring a perfect fit for their aristocratic personas.

■ Special Plus Size Men's Apparel:
To further enhance the richness of your game, this asset pack introduces a new collection of large-sized male clothing, providing creators with greater freedom for customization.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

【generator/Male】
FACE:64 pictures
SV: 56 pictures
TV: 56 pictures
TVD: 56 pictures
Variation: 28 pictures

【generator/Kid】
FACE:40 pictures
SV: 24 pictures
TV: 24 pictures
TVD: 24 pictures
Variation: 12 pictures

【tilesets (3/8 sheets)】
・B~E tiles：3/8 sheets


・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
